price: پرته د هغه (لوط -علیه السلام-) له میرمنې، مقرر کړې موږ چې یقینا دا به خامخا د پاتې کیدونکی څخه وي (په عذاب کې).
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
